about_the_game:
Tall Trails is a chill exploration game. You play as Alp, a little golem searching for his purpose in a weird and wonderful world. With your trusty Rocket Boot strapped to your back, you'll summit towering peaks, scale mysterious megastructures, and meet many strange little guys!

  • Blast off with your Rocket Boot! Load items into your Rocket Boot and blast them out to send yourself flying skywards! Each item has unique powers: jet pack with hot peppers, hover across gaps with whirligigs, swing on webs with spiders, and much more!

  • Explore a weird & wonderful world! With your Rocket Boot, no peak is too high or valley too low! Each biome is full of new and exciting ways to move and explore.

  • Find your purpose in life! Every golem has a purpose… but not you? What's up with that??

  • Customize your look & build! Find & upgrade powerful badges to increase your platforming abilities to unreasonable levels! Or just focus on collecting hats!

  • Meet strange little guys! This game is loaded with little dudes of the highest quality!! You will not find better little dudes anywhere else!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 5500 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A chill exploration game with super satisfying movement! You play as Alp, a little golem searching for his purpose. Blast yourself into the air with your rocket boot as you explore a weird and wonderful world!
